casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jason Wayne HURST. No. 363A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 24, 2005. William N. Farrell, Jr., Special Deputy Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of June 2005 by Defendant to amend record on appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of June 2005."
